Text: The keygen is not a virus. Your firewall is probably set to delete inappropriate files such as keygenerators and cracked .exe files.
How about a x86 version, is there any out yet?
svenstaro don't lie, this version doesn't work on x32...
anyone has vray 1.5 rc4x32 or vray 1.5 sp1 for 3dsmax 2008

When will anyone upload a good x86 version of this? Which is what people mean when they say x32, not realizing x32 is nothing, and x86 means 32 bit processors. 

I'm being held up until I can get my computer with max 08 able to render as well.
cant get this to work - fails on install. any hints? where do i choose the folders to install into etc.

If running Vista, run as an admin.  If running Avg uninstall it, this keymaker has a trojan.  If you have never worked with a throw away key don't bother.  Otherwise set it up, remove the key, reinstall avg.  I have major anti-viris if it gets through all 3 I quit.  You only need the keymaker 1 time.

It really works with Max 2008!! There are trojans or viruses in it (using the latest NOD32) :)

Thanks for the up!
The keygen is NOT a virus/trojan. It uses a similar behaviour, like most keygenerators, that's why antivirus triggers on it. It's safe to use.

Avg is the only one that doesn't like  the keygen.  There is absolutely nothing wrong with it like project 6 said.  For some reason about 6 months ago avg started sending all keygens to the viris bank.  I had this same one for almost a year before it started giving me grief.  NO harm..
x86 version coming? 32 bit systems are still out here...
IS NOT WORKING .. wHAT SHOULD I REPLACE?
You would want the SP4 and not the RC4 for 3ds Max 2010. This SP4 was uploaded 2007-12-05.
